categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hazeen was a Neimoidian Imperial spy who served the Imperial Intelligence during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

During the Empire's invasion on Corellia, Hazeen infiltrated the Corellian rebel forces that were planning on leading an assault on the occupation forces. Hazeen managed to alert the Imperial forces through the probe droid G-05, who was situated by Coronet Spaceport, and sent a strike team to put a stop to the attack.
